productLines.name: CreditCards
productLines.description: Enjoy access to credit for daily and even larger purchases.

products.name: Nedbank Gold Credit Card
products.shortDescription: Enjoy access to credit for daily and even larger purchases that can be used at over 25 million stores in South Africa and internationally. If you are seeking to be rewarded for your everyday spend, then the Nedbank Greenbacks Credit Card is for you. Furthermore you can support a cause through our Affinities Programme at no cost to you. Nedbank will make a contribution to the South African affinity of your choice.

eligibilityRules.description: has an annual income of R100 000

salesHighlights: Up to 55 days' interest-free credit.
Enjoy zero transaction fees
Free supplementary cards for your spouse or partner
Quick and easy contactless payment functionality
Automatic basic travel insurance cover of up to R2 000 000
For ease and convenience we offer a budget facility for larger than normal purchases which clients can then pay off over 3, 6, 12, 24 or 36 months.
Optional Credit life cover to ensure financial security and peace of mind in the event of death, disability, critical illness or retrenchment.
Option to join the Greenbacks Rewards Programme
Option to join the Nedbank Affinity Programme

Rewards: Nedbank Greenbacks members earn Greenbacks on all eligible spend*. You earn unlimited Greenbacks, twice as fast with the Greenbacks American Express Credit Card. Greenbacks Rewards is easy to understand and easy to use. You get to choose how you spend your rewards! Clients enjoy the flexibility of having two cards linked to one account – the Greenbacks American Express™ credit card and the Nedbank MasterCard credit card.

Clients earn accelerated Greenbacks with the Greenbacks American Express credit card – 2 Greenbacks rewards for every R5 eligible spend and 1 Greenbacks for every R5 eligible spend on the Nedbank MasterCard credit card.

Your rewards are automatically loaded onto a FREE Nedbank Greenbacks SHOP Card which you can use at over 100 000 leading stores nationwide, withdraw as cash from any ATM or use your SHOP CARD internationally. The choice is entirely yours.
Affinities: Through the Nedbank Affinity Programme you can choose to support the development of the arts, the preservation and conservation of the environment, sports development or help orphaned and vulnerable children.
Green Affinity – Helping you support eh environment at no cost to you
Green Affinity – Helping you support eh environment at no cost to you

products.name: Personal Loan
products.shortDescription: A personal loan is an easy and affordable way to better your life. Think about the good that a loan can do for you or your family, and you too can experience how a loan can pay you back.
salesHighlights: Loans available from R1 000 to R250 000*
Flexible repayment periods of 12 to 60 months.
Monthly repayments debited from your bank account.
The best possible interest rate that we can offer you.
Easy application process.
If your loan is approved, we will deposit the money directly into your bank account.

When you take out a personal loan, it is compulsory to have loan protection cover for death, disability and retrenchment. Nedbank Personal Loan Protection Insurance has been specially developed to help pay off your outstanding debt should you be unable to make your loan repayments in the event of your death, disablement or retrenchment. Or you can take out an insurance policy of your choice provided it has all the necessary benefits. Ask about our loan insurance when you apply for your loan.

requiredDocuments.attributeName: An email address.
Your bank details.
Your financial details - income, expenses, assets and liabilities.

Proof of income.

productLines.name: Overdraft
productLines.description: Get an overdraft facility linked to your account to manage your monthly cash flow needs.

products.name: Overdraft
products.shortDescription: An Overdraft is a revolving credit facility linked to a current account that provides access to additional funds. It is short-term borrowing facility that can help you manage unforeseen circumstances and cash flow constraints.
salesHighlights: An overdraft is linked to your transactional account - there is no need to open a separate account.
The additional funds are available once your account balance reaches zero - there is no need to transfer available funds between accounts
The overdraft limit will increase your available balance. When you look at your account, available balance includes the overdraft, the balance value does not include it.
The overdraft is available whether you choose to use it or not.
You only pay interest on the amount you have used.
You can use as much or as little of your overdraft as you like.
You will get a personalised interest rate on your overdraft.
You can choose to take out Overdraft Assurance (Credit Life) which ensures that you have peace of mind in the event of death, disablement or retrenchment.
A fee for the service is charged whether you choose to use it or not.

products.name: Nedbank TravelCard
products.shortDescription: The Travel Card allows you to lock in your rate at the point of purchase, shielding you against currency fluctuations while travelling.
salesHighlights: A card that adapts to your needs
The Nedbank Travel Card can be loaded with up to 8 different currencies at the same time, depending on your requirements.
Secured and protected with chip, Pin and signature
Your card comes with a five-digit PIN to ensure that no unauthorised person will be able to access your funds.
Free additional card
When you purchase the Nedbank Travel Card, Nedbank will issue an additional card to you at no charge. This can be used as backup if the primary card is lost, stolen or damaged.
Control

Once you have downloaded the Nedbank App Suite™ from your app store, you will be able to register the card on the Travel Card widget in the app, and view your balances and transaction history while travelling.
Global card acceptance
The Nedbank Travel Card is issued in association with Mastercard and is accepted globally at more than 34 million ATMs and merchant point-of-sale locations.
Remote topup
If you need to top up your Nedbank Travel Card while you are abroad, simply send an email to Nedbank RetailFX@nedbank.co.za and we will proccess your request.
Emergency cash

Should both cards be lost or stolen while you are travelling, call the Nedbank Contact Centre on 0860 555 111 and Nedbank will arrange emergency cash through one of our international Mastercard partners.
Reloadable
Your Nedbank Travel Card has a three-year lifespan. You will be able to reload your card multiple times if you travel again within the three year period.
Free cashout
No fees are charged when you cash out your card on return.

The Daily Hospital Benefit provides a payment, the Daily Hospital Benefit amount (sum insured) specified in the Policy Schedule, for each full day an Insured Person was Hospitalised as a result of an Accident, during the Period of Insurance.
Nedgroup Insurance Company will calculate the period of Hospitalisation in accordance with the number of full days spent in a Hospital as a Resident In-Patient as a result of an Accident.
The benefit payment shall be payable at the end of the period of Hospitalisation or when 30 (thirty) days’ benefit is due, whichever is earlier.
The Daily Hospital Benefit does not acquire any surrender value or paid-up value.
Nedgroup Insurance Company will calculate the period of Hospitalisation in accordance with the number of full days spent in a Hospital as a Resident In-Patient as a result of an Accident.
The benefit payment shall be payable at the end of the period of Hospitalisation or when 30 (thirty) days’ benefit is due, whichever is earlier.
The Daily Hospital Benefit does not acquire any surrender value or paid-up value.
Personal Accident policies pay out a maximum benefit between the range of R50, 000 and R700 000 (depending on the plan that the client has elected).
A maximum benefit payable for children age 6 months 6 years is R10 000 and 6 – 14 years is R30 000.
This policy offers the client worldwide cover, 24 hours a day.
Benefits are payable if death or disablement resulting from an accident occurs within 12 months(365 days) of the date of the accident.

products.name: Business PAYU
products.shortDescription: This product provides a safe and convenient cashless payment mechanism for goods and services, a safe depository for excess capital and access to credit facilities on application. Clients only pay for the transactions they use.
salesHighlights: Low monthly maintenance fees, pay-as-you-use pricing.
Full transactional account with linked cheque card and electronic/mobile banking access.
Access to the full range of business solutions, including point-of-sale devices, financing and investment options and other value-added services.
Earn Greenbacks loyalty points on your card spend.
Reduces the need to operate with large amounts of cash.
Offers widely accepted payment mechanisms.
Monthly statement.
A vehicle for accessing other financial services
Debit orders and stop orders.
Electronic funds transfer.
Overdraft facilities on application.

products.name: Business Enabler Account
products.shortDescription: For new and established businesses with no credit record and/or judgments against individual members. This account will enables you to (re)establish a sound credit record.Low monthly maintenance fees, pay-as-you-use pricing:
salesHighlights: Convenient banking through access to self service channels (Internet, branch, Cell phone (SMS and WAP) and Telephone banking).
Ability to make payments to third parties using any of the self service channels.
Use of debit cards at ATMs, Point of Sale for purchases, Petrol stations to pay for petrol and other supplies.
Competitive pricing that is simple to understand as most of the fees are flat fees.
Ability to get the eNote service (at a stipulated fee) in order to know when the debit card has been swiped and the transaction amount (there is a minimum amount that needs to be set).
Ability to build a credit history which will be useful for future credit applications.

filterGroups.filterDisplayName: What all features do you need

products.name: NetBank Business
products.shortDescription: NBB is Nedbank's electonic banking system for businesses. It can be accessed anywhere, anytime, through the internet or a mobile device, by means of the Nedbank App Suite. NBB Mobile is a business app for convenient, on-the-go transactions.
salesHighlights: Client enjoys mobility and security

Designed to be integrated into the client's existing line-of-business software, NetBank Business allows for more efficient transaction processing through an import capability and reconciliation that allows for the export of statement information
Clients have the control to maintaina nd update their NBB profiles and lists of beneficiaries/collectees
NBB is a fully modular system; clients only pay for what they use
NBB has an easy-to-use eLearning tool and provides context-sensitive help pages

value: Balances, statements, cheque/cash deposit images and cash management reports can be requested and reviewed
Statements can be downloaded and exported, instead of being printed
Batches of payments, transfers and collections can be created, imported and maintained

Single and bulk transactions can be captured and authorised by means of EFTs, future-dated and same-day-value (SDV) payment types and through the collection service. These payment and collection instruments with their different attributes enable beneficiary value to be provided or received earlier or on specific dates, with tracking capability.
Notifications can be used to inform a beneficiary of payment.
Beneficiaries and collectees can be added, imported and maintained.
With regard to self-service capabilities: client can reset user passwords, maintain and delete users, create nicknames for company accounts and customise proof of payment.

NBB provides flexible options such as self-imposed limits, account validations, single and dual authorisation for beneficiaries, collectees and users, account limits, settings and payments, eBill payments and transfers, combining safety measures and segregation of duty to ensure peace of mind. All collections allow for dual authorisation.
Security is a top priority with NBB, and therefore security tokens, software and hardware certificates and passwords are used.

products.name: Overdraft
products.shortDescription: This credit facility provides funds over and above the funds in a client's current account. This is also sometimes referred to as a CARA limit
salesHighlights: Assists clients with their daily cashflow
Provide bridging finance so clients can continue operating while waiting for incoming funds.

productCategories.description: I need a day to day transactional account

products.name: Business Current Account
products.shortDescription: A current account is the primary vehicle for managing the flow of funds in and out of an account.
salesHighlights: A current account provides easy access to funds
It supports widely accepted payment mechanisms, e.g. debit orders and electronic fund transfers.
It provides the facility to keep a record of transactions (statements are accessible)
It is a mechanism for accessing other, associated services.
Deposit and chequebooks can be offered in conjunction with the service.
It can be used as a billing account for various banking services, e.g. NetBank Business

products.name: NedTrust Account
products.shortDescription: The NedTrust product is an interest-bearing current account specifically designed for attorneys, to enable them to meet the requirements of the Attorneys Act 53, 1979 in respect of section 78(1) — the Attorneys Act.
salesHighlights: Nedbank can perform the calculation and reconciliation of interest and charges, on behalf of the attorney and pay the net interest automatically to the Regional Law Society.
Attorneys are allowed to off-set certain bank charges and service fees (excluding VAT) against the interest earned, prior to transferring the net-interest to the Attorneys Fidelity Fund.
